ingredients.ingredient: 2 pounds kielbasa sausage, sliced into 1/2 inch pieces

cookingTips: Brown kielbasa briefly in a skillet before adding to slow cooker for better flavor
Don't drain pineapple juice as it adds sweetness and moisture to the sauce
Stir occasionally to ensure even coating and consistent flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help me prepare an easy slow cooker appetizer with sweet pineapple and sausage
